summary: After killing her bank-robber husband, a Texas housewife must dispose of the body and find the loot while avoiding the local sheriff.
cast: Gina Gershon|Val Kilmer|Kelli Giddish|Ray Liotta|Wayne Duvall|Paul Cuneo|Richard Riehle|Sid Vicious
keywords: sheriff|white trash|cigarette smoking|friendship between women|knocked out
title: Breathless
